products.Medialuna de jamón y queso con Amor: Ham and Cheese Croissant with Love

descriptions.Espresso Motivador: Intense and concentrated coffee served in a small cup. The perfect base for many drinks, with a strong and aromatic flavor.
descriptions.Espresso doble motivador: Double espresso shot for an extra dose of energy.
descriptions.Capuccino con Amor Propio: A perfect balance between espresso, steamed milk, and foam. Creamy, foamy, and with a classic flavor.
descriptions.Americano con Estabilidad: Espresso diluted with hot water. A smoother taste, ideal if you prefer a light but characterful coffee.
descriptions.Macchiato o cortado chico con Ideas: Espresso “stained” with a touch of foamed milk. Small, strong, and with a creamy touch.
descriptions.Flat White con Inteligencia: Similar to a latte, but with more coffee and less foam. Velvety texture and intense flavor.
descriptions.Latte con limites: Espresso with lots of steamed milk and a little foam. Smooth, creamy, and perfect for those who prefer a lighter coffee.
descriptions.Mocaccino Dopaminérgico: Espresso with steamed milk and chocolate. Sweet, creamy, and with that irresistible touch of cocoa.
descriptions.Shot extra: Add an additional shot of espresso to your favorite drink.
descriptions.Leche vegetal: Plant-based milk option to customize your coffee.
descriptions.Chocotorta con placer: Classic Argentine cake made of chocolate cookies, dulce de leche, and cream cheese.
descriptions.Budín de zanahoria con salud mental: Soft cake with shredded carrot, walnuts, and a hint of cinnamon. Sweet, moist, and full of flavor.
descriptions.Brownie con Autocuidado: Intense chocolate square, with a dense texture and soft core. Ideal for chocolate lovers.
descriptions.Pie de limón con Validación: Crispy base, creamy lemon filling, and meringue on top. Perfect balance between sweet and tart.
descriptions.Alfajor con Apego seguro: Two soft cookies filled with dulce de leche covered with powdered sugar.
descriptions.Cheesecake de frutilla con creatividad: Creamy tart with a cookie base and strawberry topping. Fresh and smooth.
descriptions.Rol de canela con Autoestima: Tender dough with cinnamon and sugar filling, topped with glaze. Sweet, aromatic, and very tempting.
descriptions.Galletas con chispas de chocolate Analít: Classic, crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. Full of chocolate chips.
descriptions.2 Medialunas de manteca con Pasión: Sweet, flaky, and shiny. Perfect to accompany your coffee.
descriptions.Medialuna de jamón y queso con Amor: Soft dough with savory filling. Hot and tasty, ideal for any time of day.
descriptions.2 Medialunas de grasa con Cariño: Savory, flaky, and golden. With that classic taste that never fails.
descriptions.Tequeños (6)con Refuerzo Positivo: Fried dough sticks filled with cheese. Golden, crispy, and addictive.
descriptions.Cachito con Regulación: Soft bread in the shape of a horn, filled with ham. A Venezuelan classic.
descriptions.Scon de queso con experiencia: Wisdom and flavor in a perfect combination.
descriptions.Tostado de jamón y queso con Imaginación: Crispy bread with ham and melted cheese.
descriptions.Pan de chocolate con Impulso: Delicious sweet bread with chocolate chunks.
descriptions.Frappé de Ananá con Desahogo: Drink with pineapple fruit pulp and tropical flavor.
descriptions.Frappé de frutilla Sensorial: Cold drink with strawberry pulp and sweet flavor.
descriptions.Milkshake de chocolate con Serotonina: Cold shake with milk and lots of chocolate. Creamy and sweet.
descriptions.Té verde con Bienestar: Smooth and natural infusion. Light and with an herbal touch.
descriptions.Te negro con Alma: Intense and classic flavor. Ideal for those seeking a characterful infusion.
descriptions.Té de menta con Alegría: Refreshing and aromatic. Perfect for after eating or to relax.
descriptions.Matcha con Concentración: Green tea powder with intense flavor and creamy texture. Energizing and different.
descriptions.Té Chai con Paz: Spiced infusion with notes of cinnamon, clove, and ginger. Aromatic and warm.
descriptions.Mate cocido con abrazos: Traditional, soft, and comforting infusion. Taste of home.
